meta.description: Maximize the amount of hay processed using windrower and hay harvester on 200 acres of land.

sets.name: MACHINES
sets.description: Types of machines available for processing hay.

params.name: hay_per_acre
params.description: Amount of hay processed per acre by each machine.

params.name: methane_per_acre
params.description: Amount of methane gas produced per acre by each machine.

params.name: fuel_per_acre
params.description: Amount of fuel required per acre by each machine.

params.name: max_methane
params.description: Maximum methane gas that can be produced.

vars.name: acres
vars.description: Number of acres processed by each machine.

objective.name: max_hay_processed
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of hay processed.

constraints.name: total_acres_constraint
constraints.description: Total acres processed by both machines cannot exceed available land.

constraints.name: fuel_constraint
constraints.description: Total fuel used by both machines cannot exceed available fuel.

constraints.name: methane_constraint
constraints.description: Total methane gas produced by both machines cannot exceed the maximum allowed.
